item.title: Microsoft cuts cloud services to Israeli military unit over Palestinian surveillance

item.title: Startup founders say Trump’s $100K H-1B fee is a ‘talent tariff’ that will hurt innovation
item.description: The price hike for H1B visas could have detrimental impact on the startup industry, experts say.

item.title: Tesla asks EPA not to roll back emissions rules as Trump calls climate change a ‘con job’
item.description: The company's regulatory policy team is trying to clean up a mess that CEO Elon Musk spent $300 million to help create.

item.title: Spotify denies recent accusation that it changed its terms for artists
item.description: Spotify sets the record straight about the distribution rights of artists, podcasters, creators, and authors on the platform.
